item.title: Getting hands dirty with Flutter
item.author: Author
item.description:
An Android Developer point of view.
I have never been a fan of cross-platforms until Flutter came by. Actually, it was my first experience with cross-platforms. Never have I ever tried React Native, Ionic or whatever. But what was intriguing about Flutter? Well, since I am a Google fan and a Native Android Developer, i thought I should give it a try. Jumping into Flutter was pretty easy. They have simple documentation comparing to the Android Developers documentation, and I think it has a lot more details and better best-practices.
